title: Remove List Elements | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will be asked to write a function that removes a specified number of elements from the beginning of a list using Python's slice notation.

meta.title: Python List Manipulation | Remove List Elements | Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to easily remove elements from a Python list using slice notation. Discover a function that takes a list and an integer to remove the specified number of elements from the beginning.
meta.keywords: Python, list, manipulation, remove, slice notation, function
